latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

pastInspections.result: Reinspection Required Violations corrected at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to maintain required staff to child supervision ratios at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Permittee/applicant submitted incomplete written safety plan
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service observed at time of inspection to be providing care for infants under 12 months of age in groups mixed with older children
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At the time child care service was providing care it has been determined that the child care service failed to limit areas used by children to their exclusive use Unauthorized children and/or adults allowed to inhabit child care service facilities during child care hours
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection proper diaper changing area sanitary procedures are not being employed
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Appropriate child activity not provided by child care service unacceptable forms of discipline utilized by staff of child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service teaching staff in an infant/toddler program do not meet staff qualification requirements
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service providing care for infant/toddlers and/or night care failed to have staff complete SIDS and Shaken Baby identification and prevention training
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

pastInspections.result: Passed inspection Violations corrected at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Milk observed stored at a temperature above 41 deg F at time of inspection Milk observed stored in child care service beyond the expiration date
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards
